Title: A beautiful painting by Debasish Dutta
Narrative: This painting is very close to my heart. Created by Debashish Dutta , it’s colour scheme is very soothing . The climate change is posing a very real danger and there is an urgency to protect whatever we are left with .  ( photo credit - Shimeesha Art )
